pillars.description: Ensures that all required data is present.
Ensures that the data adheres to the defined structure and format.
Ensures that data relationships are consistent and valid.
Ensures that data is correct and free from errors.
Ensures that data is up-to-date and available when needed.
Ensures that data is uniform and consistent across different datasets and systems.
Ensures that data conforms to the defined rules and constraints.
Ensures that each data element is unique and not duplicated.
